articles.description: Lance Stroll is out while Fernando Alonso was able to limp his damaged car back to the Alpine pits.
articles.content:
Fernando Alonso and Lance Stroll were lucky to avoid disaster after they came together in a high-speed crash at the United States Grand Prix that sent the Alpine car onto two wheels.
